attributes.action: Change the law on knife crime
attributes.additional_details:
The law needs changing on knife crime to end this pandemic that is taking over the youth of today,
There is no deterrent and the sentence handed down for stabbing someone who survives is shocking 
Average 9 months time served! 

Stabbing someone is a pre meditated assault, is always done in a rage and often is done by people who know each other.

The sentence must reflect the crime knife crime is a real pandemic and there is no deterrent and it’s touch and go with most stabbings who live or dies
attributes.background: Change the law regarding knife crime so the cps can allow police to charge people with attempted murder instead of wounding with intent.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The CPS are already able to charge people with attempted murder, but this is a charging decision for them and not for the UK Government or Parliament. You can read more here:

https://www.cps.gov.uk/legal-guidance/offences-against-person-incorporating-charging-standard
